title: Denzel Washington's Reaction to Casey Affleck's Oscar Speech Says It All - Denzel Washington's Reaction to Casey Affleck's Best Actor Win At 2017 Oscars
text:
Tonight, Casey Affleck won the Oscar for Best Actor for his role in Manchester By the Sea . The actor, who has been accused of sexual harassment by two women , thanked Denzel Washington in his acceptance speech: "It means so much to me, thank you. Whew, damn it. One of the first people who taught me how to act was Denzel Washington, and I just met him tonight for the first time. Thank you." This was Denzel's reaction:
